overview: Superside is looking for Creative Project Managers to join their team. You'll build and deliver creative strategy and assets for innovative companies while working in a global remote community.
description: Superside is seeking experienced Creative Project Managers to contribute to account strategy, manage high-paced creative projects, and collaborate with customers and creatives. The role requires strong project management skills and a customer-centric approach.
requirements: 3+ years of experience as a Project/Account/Campaign manager or Creative producer
Familiarity with Adobe Suite and Figma
High-level understanding of Digital advertising and social media platforms or Branding and communications
Excellent verbal and written English skills
